docs.text: Slot Description age_at_condition_end Age of the subject at the end of the condition age_at_condition_start Age of the subject at the start of the condition age_at_exposure_end Age of the subject at the end of drug exposure age_at_exposure_start Age of the subject at the start of drug exposure age_at_observation Age of the subject at the time of observation age_at_procedure Age of the subject at the time of the procedure body_location A CURIE from UBERON body_position The body position during measurement calculated_from An expression pointing at other CDE classes collected_by Who collected the measurement condition_type A CURIE from MONDO or HPO context The context of the measurement data_type The data type of the observation description A human-readable description for a thing diagnosis_method The method used for diagnosis drug_type A CURIE from RxNorm entries The collection of CDE objects id A unique identifier for a thing instrument The instrument used for the measurement llod Lower limit of detection measurement_type A CURIE from OBA, OMOP, or LOINC method The method used for the measurement name A human-readable name for a thing procedure_type A CURIE from OMOP reagent_kit The reagent kit used for the measurement sdoh_type The type of SDOH observation subject_identifier An identifier for the subject of the datum ulod Upper limit of detection unit A unit from UCUM value The numeric value
